newsitem.title: USA: First Merchants Acceptance files Chaptr 11.
newsitem.headline: First Merchants Acceptance files Chaptr 11.

text.p: First Merchants Acceptance Corp filed for Chapter 11 protection on Friday in the U.S. Bankruptcy Court in Delaware.
Earlier this week First Merchants said it "may seek protection under the U.S. Bankruptcy Code."
The Deerfield, Illinois, company, which finances consumer purchases of used cars, said in April that it had uncovered financial irregularities "involving unauthorized entries" in its records.
First Merchants has said that it is in default on a bank loan and on two series of subordinated notes.
No other information about the bankruptcy filing is available at this time.
